attributes.additional_details:
Blackwall tunnel is vital crossing to the east of London and is over due for a new connection but with all the tax you take you give noting in return, you want us to pay to cross at blackwall to pay for a new crossing at Thamesmead; which was planned years ago and already cost us £125 million until boris cancelled it and we lost that investment.
Yes build us a bridge at Thamesmead but why the poorer end of London will have to suffer extra costs at Blackwall Tunnel is a Joke.

The rich west part of London has many crossings and pays nothing for them.
Dartford Bridge has also gone up to £2 which we were told would be free once paid for.

No toll at Blackwall tunnel!
Stop punishing the workers.
